message: That evening, after I finish work, I head to Mizuki's with a package.
We'd just gotten an order from Mizuki's shop, so I figured I'd take the opportunity to stop by.
Mizuki's shop, the Black Needle, is just north of Hum-Drum Junk.
It started as just a tattoo parlor, but after he turned the waiting room into a bar, it became something of a social spot too.
Tattoos are pretty popular in the city, both as fashion statements and to indicate Rib affiliation, so Mizuki's shop does pretty well.
Of course, Mizuki is one of the artists, so he'd ink me if I asked. I have no interest in that stuff, though.
The sun is starting to set by the time I approach the Black Needle.
This is Dry Juice territory. Gang members dot the area.
I've gotten to know some of them through Mizuki, so I usually don't have any trouble passing through.

name: ドライジュースメンバーＣ
message: "Hey, Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, been a while."

name: ドライジュースメンバーＣ
message: "Here for Mizuki?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Just delivering his order."

name: ドライジュースメンバーＣ
message: "He's at the base."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Got it. Thanks."
It's not far.
The Dry Juice base is huge, encompassing several alleys. It's expanded over time as their membership has grown.
The members are scattered through the various alleys, but Mizuki can always be found in the same spot.
He's standing in front of a staircase covered with a large Dry Juice tag, talking to some of his members.
He waves me over when he sees me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hum-Drum Junk home delivery! Thank you for your business!"

name: ミズキ
message: "Oh, is that the stuff I ordered? Thanks."
I hand him the package and send the receipt with my Coil. Once Mizuki confirms it, the delivery is complete.

name: ミズキ
message: "Thanks for doing this. I know I can depend on you guys for rare parts."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'll let Mr. Haga know you said that."

name: ミズキ
message: "You headed home after this?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: ミズキ
message: "Nothing like the end of a hard day's work, huh? I'm about to head back to the shop. Grab a drink with me, will ya?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "If you're buying."
I follow Mizuki out of the alley. Gang members greet him as we walk by. A few even bow formally, to which Mizuki smiles awkwardly in response.
The Black Needle is tucked away in a black building with only a little sign identifying it.

Stepping through the door, I'm immediately greeted by upbeat music.

The waiting room, which also doubles as a bar, is much bigger than you'd think from the outside.
In the dim light, I see a few people lounging on couches, reading magazines, or chatting quietly.
To the left is the front desk,<?>
and to the right is the bar. The door in the back leads to the tattoo studio.
While I check out the shop, Mizuki starts talking to the part-timer at the front desk.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Pretty slow today, huh?"
I ask casually after Mizuki's finished. His expression darkens.

name: ミズキ
message: "Yeah..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's wrong?"

name: ミズキ
message: "Nah, it's just... I told you about it yesterday, didn't I? The disappearances."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."

name: ミズキ
message: "I think that's why business's been so slow."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What? Like everyone's scared to go outside?"

name: ミズキ
message: "I don't think it's that bad, but... the way customer flow has dropped off, it sure feels that way."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, I get what you mean."

name: ミズキ
message: "I got some more info since then, but I've got no idea what's true at this point."
Mizuki beckons to me, his expression grave. I lean in.

name: ミズキ
message: "People say it really is Morphine abducting gangs."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No way. I mean, Morphine's..."

name: ミズキ
message: "Someone's claiming they saw them."

name: 蒼葉
message: "That's just some idiot trying to get attention. You don't actually believe it, do you?"

name: ミズキ
message: "Like I said, I dunno if it's true or not. That's just what I heard."

name: ミズキ
message: "Anyway, what I'm getting at is... now all the Rib gangs are gettin' squirrley 'cause they're scared of getting ambushed. But, hey. Whatever."
Mizuki flashes a defiant smirk.

name: ミズキ
message: "It's got nothing to do with us. Even if it is Morphine, not like they're a match for us anyway."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Right?"
I return his smile, but something about this doesn't sit right with me.
I think Mizuki's been a little too into Rib lately.
I hope he doesn't run himself ragged...

name: ミズキ
message: "Why don't we get a drink? Let's head over to the bar."
I start toward the bar, but before I get there, a tattoo design displayed on the front desk catches my eye.
It's framed. Like it's important.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Was this always here?"

name: ミズキ
message: "Oh, that? I got it from another tattoo artist I really admire. Cool, right?"

name: ミズキ
message: "He's famous, but he doesn't have his own shop. Only inks people he knows."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So everyone else he just turns away?"

name: ミズキ
message: "Exactly. He dropped by a little while back. That's when he gave it to me. He has this aura about him―you can tell he's special."
He seems genuinely happy. I guess he really liked the guy.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'd like to meet him once, if he's as amazing as you say."

name: ミズキ
message: "I thought you didn't want a tattoo."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I don't."

name: ミズキ
message: "Then the answer is no."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Aw man."

name: ミズキ
message: "If you insist, it'll be a million yen."

name: 蒼葉
message: "A million?! What a ripoff!"

name: ミズキ
message: "Ahaha."
My Coil beeps while we we're laughing.
It's a call from Delivery Works.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hello?"

name: ヨシエ
message: "Oh, thank goodness you answered! Aoba, dear, is that you?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yes?"

name: ヨシエ
message: "It's me! Me! Yoshie!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's the matter?"

name: ヨシエ
message: "Oh my, it's serious! Very serious! Please don't panic, okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Okay."

name: ヨシエ
message: "Ms. Tae, she―"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?! Granny?!"
